ja.title: 第29回日本バーチャルリアリティ学会大会の広報にCoMADOを使ったオンライン取材取り組みしました
ja.body:
2024年9月11日から開催される[第29回日本バーチャルリアリティ学会大会](https://conference.vrsj.org/ac2024/)の広報を担当させて頂くご縁があり，Xでの広報活動の中に，会場へのアクセスルートや会場の様子を事前に知って頂くため，オンラインでの会場探訪に[CoMADO](https://comado.co)を使って取材して投稿記事まとめました．

また，VR学会らしく，口頭発表会場をバーチャルに制作し，発表練習に活用するための部屋の作成にもCoMADOでのロケハン取材活用しました！

en.title: Online Location Observation Using CoMADO to Publicize the 29th Annual Conference of Virtual Reality Society of Japan
en.body:
I have the opportunity to be in charge of publicity for the [29th Virtual Reality Society of Japan Conference](https://conference.vrsj.org/ac2024/) to be held from September 11, 2024, and as part of the publicity activities at X, I have compiled an article using [CoMADO](https://comado.co) to cover the online venue exploration to let people know the access route to the venue and the appearance of the venue in advance. 

To let people know about the access route to the venue and the venue in advance, I used CoMADO to visit the venue online and wrote an article about it.

We also used CoMADO for location scouting to create a virtual room,  as is typical for a VR conference, and to create a room to be used for practicing presentations!
